subject: [junit] before/after class listener
msgSnippet: Hi, I am working on project depending on JUnit4. It is essential for us to be notify before and after each class. Is there a way to do that or can it be
messageBody:
Hi,

I am working on project depending on JUnit4.
It is essential for us to be notify before and after each class.
Is there a way to do that or can it be supported in the near future ?
Is there a way to access the private member fNotifier in JUnitCore ? we need
it to access the pleaseStop method.

Thanks
Idan
--
View this message in context: http://www.nabble.com/before-after-class-listener-tp19509438p19509438.html
